child.pub-comments: The author calls this an 'emergent language', which signifies that it is not quite distinct from other languages in the language area. Speakers: 32000

root.pub-comments: "The Macro-Tupi-Karibe cluster is set up on the basis of evidence collected by Aryon Rodrigues, with additional evidence found by Doris Payne and Spike Gildea." (74)
